contents: A HUGE FIRE HAS STARTED IN THE EAST SIDE OF KELVINGROVE PARK,
THE LOCAL SQUIRREL FORCES ARE NOT ENOUGH TO STOP IT, PLEASE SEND HUMANS!!!

option tags.y: send some humans to help stop the fire

contents: You send a team of human firefighters to the east,
They succeed in putting out the fire, but some are severely wounded.
You refuse to send any humans, the fire rages on but eventually peters out,
some squirrels do get seriously burned however.
